name: PicSee
description: PicSee is a cloud-based URL shortening platform that enhances link management and marketing analytics.
longDescription: PicSee is a Taiwan-based SaaS platform founded in 2015, specializing in URL shortening and link management solutions for marketers, businesses, and content creators. It enables users to create branded short URLs, customize link previews, and track performance metrics seamlessly. The platform addresses challenges like updating URLs after campaigns launch or managing complex UTM parameters for analytics. By integrating with tools like Google Analytics (GA4) and offering AI-driven features, PicSee helps users boost click-through rates and optimize digital marketing efforts. Its mission is to empower marketers with data-driven insights and flexible link management, making it a trusted choice for major Taiwanese companies.
features: Shorten URLs instantly with branded domains to enhance recognition and trust.
Customize link previews, including thumbnails and titles, to increase social media click-through rates.
Update destination URLs anytime, even after QR codes or links are shared, for flexible campaign management.
Generate QR codes automatically with each shortened link for immediate use in marketing materials.
Use the UTM Builder to save and apply parameters for seamless Google Analytics (GA4) integration.
Track link performance with analytics to measure clicks and audience engagement.
Create AI-generated titles and social media post suggestions to optimize link sharing.
Categorize and manage short links with tags for organized campaign tracking.
Integrate with Facebook Pixel and Google Tag Manager for advanced ad targeting and tracking.
Shorten URLs in bulk using spreadsheets for efficient large-scale campaign management.

faqs.question: What is PicSee used for?
faqs.answer: PicSee is a URL shortening platform that helps marketers create branded links, customize previews, and track performance for digital campaigns.

faqs.question: Is PicSee free to use?
faqs.answer: Yes, PicSee offers free link shortening with unlimited usage, though some advanced features may require a paid plan.

faqs.question: Can I change a URL after creating a QR code?
faqs.answer: Yes, PicSee allows you to update the destination URL anytime, even after QR codes or links are shared.

faqs.question: Does PicSee support analytics tracking?
faqs.answer: PicSee integrates with Google Analytics (GA4) and supports UTM parameters to track traffic and campaign performance.

faqs.question: Can I customize how my links appear on social media?
faqs.answer: Yes, PicSee lets you customize link thumbnails and titles to make them more engaging on social platforms.

faqs.question: Does PicSee offer branded short URLs?
faqs.answer: PicSee enables users to create branded short URLs without engineering support, enhancing brand recognition.

faqs.question: Are PicSeeâ€™s short links permanent?
faqs.answer: Yes, short links created with PicSee are valid forever, ensuring long-term usability.

faqs.question: Can I use PicSee for bulk URL shortening?
faqs.answer: PicSee supports bulk URL shortening via spreadsheets, streamlining large-scale campaign management.
